titles.title: A resolution raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 381 - 0 (Record Vote No: 34).

bill.summary: 3/17/1988--Introduced. Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives to take measures to ensure future uninterrupted audio and visual broadcast coverage of House proceedings.
